pr_title: The shutdown hook wasn't starting the right thread and leaking the ca…

timeline.message:
The shutdown hook wasn't starting the right thread and leaking the cacheDir to null while still in use

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: instead of a Latch use thread.join on the thread that was started
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.message:
Avoid using latch, use the Thread join method instead

Signed-off-by: Paulo Lopes <pmlopes@gmail.com>
